-- angle in degree Box = {series, center, w, h, mass=10, acc=Vector(0,0), angle=0, damping=0.99, visible=true} function Box:new(o) o = o or {} o.origin = o.center:clone() o.prevCenter = o.center:clone() setmetatable(o, self) self.__index = self return o end
function Box:reset() self.acc = Vector(0,0) self.center = self.origin:clone() self.prevCenter = self.origin:clone() end
function Box:initDrawing() plotTools.drawSquare(self.series, vector({0,0}), self.w, self.h) end
function Box:draw() self.series.Transform = matrixf.translation(self.center.x, self.center.y, 0) * matrixf.rotationAboutAxis(0,0,1,math.rad(self.angle)) end
function Box:applyForce(f) self.acc = self.acc + f/self.mass end
function Box:isTouched(x,y) local hw = self.w/2 local hh = self.h/2 return (x>self.center.x-hw and x<self.center.x+hw and y>self.center.y-hh and y<self.center.y+hh) end
function Box:updatePhysics(t) local vel = self.damping * (self.center - self.prevCenter) local newCenter = self.center + vel + 0.5 * t * t * self.acc self.prevCenter = self.center self.center = newCenter self.acc = Vector(0,0) end
